title: Silca releases gorgeous limited edition retro posters (and winter socks)
content:
The last time Silca ran a poster, it sold out super quick. So, this time, they printed more…but there’s still only 100 each of these four killer designs. Each one features an original work of art from former pro triathlete Tony DeBoom, who also happens to be the creative director and founder of Endurance Conspiracy

The post Silca releases gorgeous limited edition retro posters (and winter socks) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
